divs: Sighting DetailsAround midnight on July 1st 2010 I was looking at the sky, which was cloudless, when I spotted an object far from the horizon, which resembled a star, but was moving relatively fast. It looked like it was high in the atmosphere. The sight lasted for a few seconds, when the object just disappeared. I stress again that there wasn't a single cloud in the sky, so the UFO couldn't have went behind one.
Summary: A star-like object moving fast high in the atmosphere.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Plovdiv
There were no other sightings in Plovdiv on or around July 1st 2010
